2025-03-06.title: Murphy Exclusive Weapon
2025-03-06.description: Murphy's Exclusive Weapon available, turning your hero into the ultimate guardian for your troops with a powerful boost!

2025-03-09.title: Cold Wave Alert! -30C
2025-03-09.description: Cold waves are coming, this is the same event of week 1: Cold Wave Alert (Min Temp: -20), but blizzards reach level 5 with -30 °C.

2025-03-09.title: Polar Dishes
2025-03-09.description: This event is quite simple and it consists in gathering ingredients completing daily task quests and then composing meals for the husky Snowflake.

2025-03-10.title: Beast Crisis!
2025-03-10.description: Emperor Boreas has unleashed his strongest beast troops to attack you. Their main target is the Alliance Furnace. We must defend these heat sources and stop the Emperor’s plans!

2025-03-12.title: Zombie Invasion
2025-03-12.description: Once the Zombie Invasion starts, numerous invading zombies will appear in the World Map. Kill the zombies to gain resource rewards, courage medals and to spawn Zombie Boss that carry huge rewards.

2025-03-19.title: General's Trial
2025-03-19.description: The General’s Trial is a recurring event that offers a lot of rewards. It includes solo and alliance challenges. It lasts 4 days during which you can organize the challenges to optimize the stamina you use to complete them.

2025-03-20.title: Carlie Exclusive Weapon
2025-03-20.description: Carlie's Exclusive Weapon available. The skilled guardian will protect your troops, providing your hero with a significant boost!

2025-03-26.title: Zombie Invasion
2025-03-26.description: Once the Zombie Invasion starts, numerous invading zombies will appear in the World Map. Kill the zombies to gain resource rewards, courage medals and to spawn Zombie Boss that carry huge rewards.

2025-04-02.title: General's Trial
2025-04-02.description: The General’s Trial is a recurring event that offers a lot of rewards. It includes solo and alliance challenges. It lasts 4 days during which you can organize the challenges to optimize the stamina you use to complete them.

2025-04-09.title: Zombie Invasion
2025-04-09.description: Once the Zombie Invasion starts, numerous invading zombies will appear in the World Map. Kill the zombies to gain resource rewards, courage medals and to spawn Zombie Boss that carry huge rewards.

2025-04-10.title: Swift Exclusive Weapon
2025-04-10.description: Swift's Exclusive Weapon available. This is an intense firepower party, where your hero will receive a massive boost!

2025-04-28.title: Age Of Oil
2025-04-28.description: Fresh energy fuels groundbreaking technology, setting the stage for your base's next big evolution!.

2025-04-28.title: Tempest Beast
2025-04-28.description: Tempest Beast unlocks. Kill the Zombie Boss and awaken Glacieradon, the beast lurking beneath the icy surface! Rally your allies for an epic battle!

2025-04-28.title: General's Trial
2025-04-28.description: In General's Trial, advanced difficulty unlocks. Take on greater challenges, defeat formidable enemies, and earn universal exclusive weapons!

2025-06-02.title: Doomsday
2025-06-02.description: The infected former baseball legend is causing chaos!

2025-06-06.title: Overlord available
2025-06-06.description: Rescue the Gorilla Overlord to gain a powerful battlefield ally--make your enemies tremble in fear!
